column1: Funeral services will be held Tuesday
column3: 2015 at a 10:00 a.m. Mass of Christian Burial in St. Landry Catholic Church for Jeanette Moran Charles
column7: 2015 at her residence in Opelousas. Interment will be in Bellevue Memorial Park in Opelousas. Rev. Monsignor Louis Melancon
column8: pastor of St. Landry Catholic Church
column9: will officiate at the services. A rosary will be prayed at 7:00 p.m. Monday in the funeral home. The family requests that visiting hours be observed from 4:00 p.m. until 9:00 p.m. Monday and will continue from 8:00 a.m. until service time on Tuesday.
